message.content:
cs.CR, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.SE 

This paper discusses the use of blockchain technology in IoT and edge computing scenarios, with a focus on resource-constrained devices. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also discusses scalability and sustainability, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). The use of IoT devices and networks suggests cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) as another possible category. The paper also discusses decision making and system design, which could place it in cs.SY (Systems and Control) or cs.SE (Software Engineering).
